name: Dead of Night
description: Dead of Night is a 2D flipscreen adventure game inspired by such 8-bit classics as Spike in Transylvania, Bride of Frankenstein, Werewolves of London and the Dizzy series.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad Core processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7850 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: On Board
